'Y' == yes, 'N' == no

0 == use INVISB flag in decision
1 == ignore INVISB flag

Exports.name: ONSYS
Comments: Determines if a user is online
1 == user is online & logged in

Exports.name: ONSYSN

Exports.name: OPINF

Exports.name: OPNMSG

Prior PUSH contains file name reference

Exports.name: OTHKEY
Comments: Does other user have the key to this lock?

Exports.name: OTHUAP
Comments: Pointer to structure for that user in the 'usracc' structure (set by onsys() or instat())

Exports.name: OTHUSN
Comments: User Number of the other user (set by onsys() or instat())

Exports.name: OTHUSP
Comments: Pointer to structure for that user in the user[] array (set by onsys() or instat())

Comments: Test if the user has enough credits
1 == enough, 0 == not enough

1 == enough, 0 == not enough

1 == show, 0 == hide

0 == same

Comments: Returns the length of the C string str.

DDDDD representing 1 through 31

Input: Two long values on stack
Output: DX:AX = arg1 % arg2

CL == How many to move

CL == How many to move
